subject: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the newly appointed Director, Foreign Remittance Department of Banco de espana (Bank of Spain)
 On assumption of office last Friday, a meeting was held in our bank with all the board of directors and the President of our country presided over this meeting.  One of the agendas of the meeting had to do with payment of all over-due/outstanding  to foreign contractors/inheritors of all their funds which the past directors delayed the payments as a result of their selfish aims.
 Our board of directors have empowered me through the order of the Presidency to contact you so that you can receive your over-due fund three million,five hundred thousand dollars ($3,500,000.00) which is still with our bank without any further stress.  So if you are ready and interested in receiving this fund, please kindly respond to this email so that I will guide you on a few requirements that you need to meet in order to receive this fund.
 Note: Please if you are not interested in receiving this funds, kindly send us a signed document requesting us to divert all your funds to children of the orphanage (Charity)
   Thanking you while awaiting your swift response so we can serve you better.
Best Regards.
Maria Aduhail
Director, Foreign Remittance Dept.
Banco de espana

subject: Re:   I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Hello Mrs. Maria Aduhail,

Thank you for reaching out to me and congratulations on your new position as the Director of the Foreign Remittance Department at Banco de Espana. It's great to hear that your bank is taking steps to resolve issues related to delayed payments.

I'm intrigued by the information you've shared about a fund of three hundred thousand dollars. However, I would like to understand more about this situation. Could you please provide more details? For instance, how did my name come up in relation to this fund? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Mr. Harold,
          I confirm receipt of your mail but kindly note that your funds in
our bank is not three hundred thousand dollars ($300,000) but rather three
million, five hundred thousand dollars ($3,500,000).
         Due to the financial crisis and the global economic impact and
unrest caused by the COVID-19, your name was among the seventy-five (75)
beneficiaries awarded financial support during the COVID-19 pandemic
palliative whom were due to receive the sum of three million, five hundred
thousand dollars ($3,500,000) few years back but the past director and some
employees delayed the payments for their selfish interests in order to
divert the funds to their personal use but our accountants and auditors who
are on the clock 24/7 detected the fraudulent acts of the director and it's
cohorts and are currently facing charges for their crimes.
       Mr. Harold, in order to receive such funds, kindly send us the
following details to enable us process your funds to you as soon as
possible:
Full name
Email address
Phone number/Whatsapp
Account number
Fax
Form of ID
Ensure you provide a valid ID to enable us verify your details accurately.
Best regards

Maria Aduhail
Director Foreign Remittance Dept
Banco De Espana

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Hello Maria Aduhail,

Thank you for your email. It's quite surprising to hear about the situation at the bank and I'm glad that those responsible are facing charges. 

I'm curious, how was my name selected for this financial support? Also, could you please explain more about this pandemic palliative? I'd like to understand better before we proceed.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Mr. Harold,
You were among the seventy-five (75) beneficiaries selected randomly for
support, it's the banks policy since the pandemic started, the bank selects
beneficiaries for supports every year and the bank also yearly visits the
orphanage homes and camps.
Note it's your decision to make on not to receive this funds, if you are
unable to claim these funds, kindly send us a signed document of your
signature requesting us to divert all your funds to charity or ignore this
mail and your funds will automatically be transferred to another
beneficiary within 42 hours.
Best regards

Maria Aduhail
Director Foreign Remittance Dept
Banco De Espana

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Hello Maria Aduhail,

Thank you for your email. It's quite surprising to hear that I've been selected for support by the bank. Could you please provide more details about this program? How was I chosen and what does it entail exactly?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "divert all your funds to charity"? Does this mean the support from the bank or my personal funds?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Mr. Harold,
For security reasons and avoidance of employees stealing unclaimed funds,
we at the Banco de espana with the order of the presidency and stakeholders
has put in place policies guiding unclaimed funds, no unclaimed funds are
to be left unclaimed, if any beneficiary refused to claim his or her funds,
such funds are to be automatically transferred to another beneficiary, if
the said beneficiary refused to send a signed document of his or her
signature requesting for his or her funds be diverted to charity.
Best regards

Maria Aduhail
Director Foreign Remittance Dept
Banco De Espana

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Hello Maria Aduhail,

Thank you for your message and the information about the policies at Banco de Espana. It's interesting to learn how unclaimed funds are handled.

Could you please explain more about the process of diverting these funds to charity? How is it decided which charities receive these funds? Also, what happens if the original owner of the funds comes forward after they have been given to charity?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Mr. Harold,
Your funds is safe and with the bank, if the beneficiary is unable or not
willing to claim his or her funds, they can send a signed document of their
signature requesting the bank to divert the funds to charity or ignore the
mail and within 42 hours, automatically transferred to another
beneficiary...
Mr. Harold, you can get a document of all these once you get your proof of
funds...
Best regards

Maria Aduhail
Director Foreign Remittance Dept
Banco De Espana

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Hello Maria Aduhail,

Thank you for your prompt response. It's good to know that the funds are safe with the bank. I'm curious, how does the process of diverting unclaimed funds to charity work? And what happens if someone ignores the mail?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Mr. Harold,
I can't give you confidential information because it's against the policy
of bank...

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Hello Mr. Harold,

I hope this message finds you well. I understand your request, however, I must inform you that due to the bank's policy, I am unable to provide the information you're asking for. 

Could you perhaps clarify why you need this information? Maybe there's another way we can assist you without violating any policies.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Mr. Harold,
Kindly ignore this mail
Best regards

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:

I hope this message finds you well. I received your email, but I'm not quite sure what it's about. Could you please provide more details so that I can better understand the situation? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:

All questions are answered in our documents which will be provided when
needed

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Hello Mr. Harold,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm always eager to learn more and share information. Could you please elaborate on the type of documents you're referring to? What kind of questions do they answer? I'm really interested in understanding more about this.

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Hello Mr. Harold,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm glad to hear that all the answers to my questions are available in your documents. Could you please tell me more about these documents? What kind of information do they contain? And when would be the appropriate time for them to be provided?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Mr. Harold,
  Kindly make a payment of one thousand and thirty dollars ($1,030) and all
these documents will be made available to you

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Hello Mr. Harold,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm intrigued by your proposal, but could you please provide more details? What exactly are these documents that will be made available to me upon payment? And why is there a need for such a specific amount of one thousand and thirty dollars?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Mr. Harold,
Kindly make a payment for the documents you required, address all your
questions at www.bancodeespana.com

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Hello Mr. Harold,

I hope this message finds you well. I understand that you require some documents. Could you please clarify which specific documents you need? Also, there might be a small fee associated with the procurement of these documents. 

Could you also let me know if there are any other questions or concerns that you have? I'm here to help and would be more than happy to assist in any way possible.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Mr. Harold,
Kindly make the payment or ignore the message, or provide your
documents....have a great day, I won't answer your message again

subject: Re: I am Mrs. Maria Aduhail, the
body:
Hello Mr. Harold,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm writing to you regarding the payment matter we discussed earlier. You have two options at this point - either proceed with the payment or choose to ignore this message, whichever suits your situation best.

However, I would love to understand more about your decision. Could you please share your thoughts on this? Remember, communication is key in our dealings and it would be greatly appreciated if we could keep the conversation going.

Please note that there's no pressure from my end and I respect whatever decision you make. 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Harold
